mapper.select: select * from IP_UPLOADFILEINFO where JLZT = '1' and WJSCXXZJ = #{id}
select * from IP_UPLOADFILEINFO where JLZT = '1' and YWBH = #{docId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IP_UPLOADFILEINFO (WJSCXXZJ, LCYWBH, YWBH, BCWJM, WJYM, WJDX, WJLJ, CJR, CJSJ, ZHXGR, ZHXGSJ, JLZT) values (#{wjscxxzj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lcywbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ywbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bcwjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wjym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wjdx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wjlj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zhxgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhxgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jlzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
